lead_paragraph: WEISSMAN--Alfred. Center for Entrepreneurial Jewish Philanthropy mourns the loss of Alfred Weissman, a leader whose wisdom and generosity touched the lives of many. We extend our condolences to Constance and the entire family. Joseph Hyman, Rachel Berg, Julie Franklin, Steven Gelles & Peter Hochfelder, Trustees 1/3
